        :::section [height=50%][align=center][padding=20][valign=middle]
            During **Super Bowl** season, **Frank's RedHot** partnered with **Paris** for their **"That's RedHot"** campaign, delivering exceptional performance across multiple metrics. [fontsize=18][line-spacing=1.5][color=#333333]
        :::

        :::row [gap=20]

                    AGGREGATE READERSHIP [fontsize=7.5][color=#666668]
                :::
            :::

[background=#eeeeee][fontsize=11]

:::section [padding=20]
Campaign Statistics [align=center][font-family="Playfair Display"][fontsize=25][color=#333333]

**That's RedHot** campaign during Super Bowl [align=center][fontsize=14][font-family="Open Sans"][color=#333333][margin-top=10][margin-bottom=30]

| Category | Metric |[background=#e06666][color=white] [font-size=11]|
|---|---|---|
| **Reach & Visibility** | Total Impressions: 43,431,803 |[font-size=11][font-family="Roboto"] |
| | Aggregate Readership: 4.8 billion |[fontsize=11][font-family="Roboto"] |
| **Engagement** | Total Engagements: 134,431 |[fontsize=11][font-family="Roboto"] |
| | Hero Stat: 6.6M video views in first 24 hours (IG) |[fontsizee=11][font-family="Roboto"] |
| | Earned Media Value (Day 1): $1.3 million |[fontsize=11][font-family="Roboto"] |
| **Media Value** | Ad Equivalency: $9.1 million |[fontsize=11][font-family="Roboto"] |
| **Media Coverage** | USA Today, AdWeek, Extra TV, Access Daily, Daily Mail, Brand Innovators |[fontsize=11][font-family="Roboto"] |
| **Social Execution** | 7 posts across Instagram and TikTok |[fontsize=11][font-family="Roboto"] |
:::
